subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3803 has been delivered
description_text:
Hi i received your product, after assembling the pedals, it seems like the
package was missing a cable that connects directly from the 24V haptics
power supply into the electricity socket.
I can't find it anywhere.

Thanks,

Omri.

conversations.body_text: Hi Omry Levy,  We will check to see if any motor was missed in the shipment. The power supply is shipped together with the motor. The pedals themselves only need USB to operate.
